root: ^Thank God there's someone who can I ask for help.
^I can't found the 2 rovers on my vicinity.
^Can you find them? There are white big machine that can help human to find and discover something new.
^My team and I can't travel away from the base.
^The team need to stay on the base.
^In exchange I will tell you there's a missing treasure in Mercury.
^But you need to find them and be careful the time there is short.
^It is known that there's only 88 days there.
^So goodluck finding my rovers and the treasure.
